name: Jane Doe
description: Jane has 15+ years of experience helping individuals and families.
experience: 2010 Counselor at Irvington Counseling Center: Started as a junior counselor, focusing on family therapy.
2015 Lead Counselor at Irvington Counseling Center: Promoted to lead, overseeing all counseling programs.

name: John Smith
description: John specializes in adolescent counseling and group therapy.
experience: 2012 Therapist at Wellness Center: Worked with teens and young adults.

name: Mary Johnson
description: Mary has a Master's in Social Work and focuses on community outreach.
experience: 2015 Clinical Social Worker at Community Health Services: Engaged in community mental health initiatives.

name: Mark Thompson
description: Mark is a board-certified psychiatrist with a focus on medication management.
experience: 2016 Psychiatrist at City Mental Health Clinic: Provides medication management and therapy.

name: Linda Garcia
description: Linda is a graduate student specializing in counseling psychology.
experience: 2021 Counseling Intern at Community Wellness Center: Assists in counseling sessions and community outreach.

name: Susan Lee
description: Susan has a PhD in Clinical Psychology and focuses on cognitive behavioral therapy.
experience: 2018 Psychologist at Mindful Therapy: Specializes in CBT and mindfulness techniques.
